unnormalised: Hey, thanks for the injury updates! Hope Hardik recovers soon; heard he tweaked his hamstring. Reminds me of the twisted ankles in "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge!" Any news on Bumrah's back? Last I heard, he was at the NCA in Bangalore. Hopefully, he's back bowling those yorkers at 140+ kmph soon. Wishing them a speedy recovery.
normalised: Hey, thanks for the injury updates! Hope Hardik recovers soon; heard he tweaked his hamstring. Reminds me of the twisted ankles in "Dilwale Dulhania Le Jayenge!" Any news on Bumrah's back? Last I heard, he was at the N C A in Bangalore. Hopefully, he's back bowling those yorkers at one hundred and forty plus kilometer per hour soon. Wishing them a speedy recovery.
